HOME.TITLE_BOTTOM: What is the purpose of this form?
HOME.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: This form allows us to determine whether you are the beneficiary of one or more life insurance policies taken out by the deceased with another insurer.
HOME.SECOND_PARAGRAPH: This information will help us define the tax exemption you may be entitled to and the applicable taxation based on your situation, as well as settle the amount with the Tax Administration.

MODAL.TITLE: Your personal data
MODAL.PARAGRAPH1: The information collected through this document is necessary for the Insurer to settle the death benefit you are entitled to and to meet its legal obligations.
MODAL.PARAGRAPH2: You have various rights regarding your personal data (right to access, rectification, opposition, etc.). For more information, you can visit the following address:
